Package controller

Class AppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AppController

  • public class AppController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the CONTROLLER in the MVC model. It is the main interface between MODEL and VIEW This class was remade from the ground up in order to make its code reusable and compact. it is better organized, implements inheritance and reflectiopn in order to rehuse as many methosds as posible.
    Version:
    2.0

      This class implements ActionListener and gives a custom functionality to each swing component
      (package private) class  AppController.MyActionList
      This class implements ListSelectionListener and gives a custom functionality to the JLists in the GUI
